bibl.title: Three Astronomical Tables from Tebtunis.
bibl.note: Found among the papyri belonging to the Egypt Exploration Society at the Ashmolean Museum. Purchased, rather than excavated, during one of Grenfell and Hunt's seasons in Egypt. - 1. E.E.S. inv. 79/82 (1), inscribed "T 203". Second half of the first century A.D. - 2. E.E.S. inv. 79/82 (2), inscribed "T 202". 2nd century? - 3. E.E.S. inv. 79/1 (1)b, inscribed "T 43". 2nd century?
JONES Alexander, Three Astronomical Tables from Tebtunis.
